Test Name: Smith-Lemli-Opitz Syndrome, DHCR7 Gene, Full Gene Analysis
Purpose: To detect pathogenic variants in the DHCR7 gene associated with Smith-Lemli-Opitz Syndrome via full gene sequencing.
Equipment: Spectrophotometer (NanoDrop), fluorometer (Qubit), PCR thermocycler, agarose gel electrophoresis system, capillary sequencer (ABI 3500 Genetic Analyzer)
